articles.title: Top gainers, losers today: Asian Paints, IndusInd Bank, Infosys, Power Grid, Reliance Industries; check full list | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Top gainers, losers: Heavyweights including Infosys, Asian Paints, UltraTech Cement emerged as top gainers, while Reliance Industries was the bigest drag in today's session.
articles.content: Domestic benchmark indices Sensex and Nifty settled lower on Thursday, August 24, over profit booking in shares of select heavyweights, including Reliance Industries and HDFC Bank, ahead of the relea… [+4023 chars]
